title: Starter Motor - Removal

body.body: Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
An unstable motorcycle may fall, causing injury to the operator or damage to the motorcycle.
Note the routing and orientation of the breather hoses and harnesses for installation.
Ease the boot from the starter cable terminal and then release the cable bolt.
Detach the cable from the starter motor.
Disconnect the low oil pressure warning light switch.
Disconnect the crankshaft position sensor electrical connector.
Note the position of the mounting bracket for the crankshaft position sensor's multiplug for installation.
Release the fixings securing the starter to the crankcase.
Noting the position of the crankshaft position sensor multiplug, remove the starter motor from the upper crankcase.
